pr_title: [#10221] Add update student cascade LNP test case

timeline.message: add update student cascade LNP test case
Merge branch 'lnp-student-update' of https://github.com/Derek-Hardy/teammates into lnp-student-update

timeline.bodyText: The lint errors in the CI are for the indentation in 293/4 & 299. You can try running ./gradlew lint locally to catch them :)
timeline.author: madanalogy

timeline.bodyText: I think update this field will also cause cascade update. Have u considered this?
timeline.author: xpdavid

replies.bodyText:
Yup, I am considering the worst case of a general student update here.
Maybe in the future, if we want a more fine-grained LNP test, we can separate it out to 2 test cases, one for course_id, and one for section name.
replies.author: Derek-Hardy

replies.bodyText:
Maybe in the future, if we want a more fine-grained LNP test, we can separate it out to 2 test cases, one for course_id, and one for section name.

I think this is more important to do. See if you can finish before your internship ends :P
replies.author: xpdavid

replies.bodyText:
If you check the code, there are three different conditions for student cascade update:

Changing student email
Changing student team
Changing student section

For LnP test to be successful in catching bottleneck operations, they need to be separate.
replies.author: wkurniawan07
